title: List of science fiction comedy works

paragraphs.text: This is a list of science fiction comedy worksâ€”those mixing soft science fiction or science fantasy with comedy.

paragraphs.title: Television
paragraphs.text: There are many animated Japanese series which use a science fiction-comedy or science fiction-fantasy-comedy setting. Urusei Yatsura, Dr. Slump, FLCL, Irresponsible Captain Tylor and Tenchi Muyo! are examples.
